name: Chicken Reuben Casserole
author: 7Amy7
summary: Easy, quick, and delicious casserole using common ingredients.
ingredients: 1 (6 ounce) package quick-cooking stuffing mix (such as Stove Top®)
1 (16 ounce) package skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, cut into bite-size pieces
½ (16 ounce) bottle French salad dressing, or to taste
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Bring water to a boil in a saucepan
Stir stuffing mix into the water, place a lid on the saucepan, and remove pan from heat
Let sit until the stuffing is thickened, about 5 minutes
Mix sauerkraut, chicken, Swiss cheese, and Cheddar cheese together in a large bowl
Stir enough French dressing into the sauerkraut mixture to moisten to your liking; spread into a casserole dish
Spread stuffing over the sauerkraut mixture
Bake in the preheated oven until browned along the edges, about 25 minutes
